thread.title: Barack And Malia Obama Look So Happy On Adorable Dinner Date In NYC
thread.title_full: Barack And Malia Obama Look So Happy On Adorable Dinner Date In NYC

author: Kaylin Pound
title: Barack And Malia Obama Look So Happy On Adorable Dinner Date In NYC
text:
Like Us On Facebook Like Us On Facebook 
If you’ve been paying attention to the latest celeb sightings in New York City, you may have heard the former president, Barack Obama , made an unexpected visit to Manhattan yesterday. 
Throughout the day, people have been buzzing about Obama sightings and sharing videos on social media showing the 44th POTUS out and about in the Big Apple. Obama surprised New Yorkers in the Flatiron district To view this video please enable JavaScript, and considerupgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video 
While the exact reason for his trip to New York City remains unknown, many people are guessing Barack Obama is in Manhattan to visit his oldest daughter, Malia Obama . 
Malia is living in New York City for the summer while she works as an intern for the famous producer, Harvey Weinstein, before heading off to college in the fall. 
In addition to being spotted on Fifth Avenue earlier today, several people also saw Barack Obama having dinner with Malia last night. Instagram 
That’s right. Barack and Malia Obama went on an adorable dinner date in NYC on Thursday evening, and these two looked so damn happy together, I literally can’t even right now. 
The precious pair shared an intimate dinner at Emilio’s Ballato, a cozy Italian restaurant located on East Houston Street. Instagram 
Based on Barack Obama’s gigantic grin, it’s not hard to see the former president had an amazing time with his daughter. Instagram 
Several people managed to snap pictures of the father-daughter duo while dining at the restaurant, and a few passersby also noticed Barack and Malia as they were leaving the restaurant. Instagram 
Although some photos of Barack and Malia Obama ended up on social media, their adorable dinner date somehow managed to remain under the radar until earlier today. Here's footage of President Obama and Malia leaving dinner, on Mott St in NYC, to cheers from onlookers. Randomly stumbled into it pic.twitter.com/tdhyK4Ezm9 
— Versha Sharma (@versharma) February 24, 2017 
Now, the news of Barack and Malia Obama’s father-daughter dinner date is giving people all the feels. 
Maybe if we’re lucky enough, Malia will be able to convince Barack and Michelle Obama to spend the whole summer in New York City. We're Going To Miss Michelle Obama To view this video please enable JavaScript, and considerupgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video
